Note - Available credit includes items in transit.

Your statement balance consists of any balance showing on your previous statement, plus all transactions posted within this statement.

Interest is charged daily and will increase the longer payment is delayed. If your account is not fully cleared, interest will be charged on your daily balance, not just your outstanding balance.

Statements are available online for up to 3 months.
